snippet: The president of the Minneapolis Federal Reserve, Narayana Kocherlakota, said on Thursday that inflation was set to stay below the Fed’s target of 2 percent until 2018.
abstract: Narayana Kocherlakota, president of the Minneapolis Federal Reserve, says inflation is set to stay below Fed's 2 percent target until 2018, sign that it should do more to lift inflation and bring down the unemployment rate.
lead_paragraph: The president of the Minneapolis Federal Reserve, Narayana Kocherlakota, said on Thursday that inflation was set to stay below the Fed’s target of 2 percent until 2018.

headline.main: President of Minneapolis Fed Calls for Higher Inflation
headline.print_headline: President of Minneapolis Fed Calls for Higher Inflation
